metadata.title: CVE-2023-35940 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 9.5.0 and prior to version 10.0.8, an incorrect rights check on afile allows an unauthenticated user to be able to access dashboards data.Version 10.0.8 contains a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
